mission.posting: Find IP by domain and remove it.

email.subject: IP Lookup
email.body: Hey #PLAYERNAME#! You need to find the IP address for the domain "sectools.org". Try to ping it or use the host command on your current system. After you get the IP address, delete all listing documents. We need to remove them because they will change the domain's IP, so remove it! Best regards, Codex Connect Hub Services

attachments.note: In your actual terminal, use host "nameofdomain"
